TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE and live in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants sued the ORG association seeking conclusion of employment contracts .

CARDINAL . NORP The Nagatinskiy ORG of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) scheduled the first hearing for DATE . Between DATE and DATE CARDINAL hearing was held as planned . CARDINAL scheduled hearings did not take place due to the respondent ’s default in appearance or requests for adjournment , QUANTITY hearings had to be postponed following the applicants’ failure to appear or requests for adjournment , and QUANTITY hearings could not proceed as both parties either failed to submit evidence or to show in court altogether .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG considered that the applicants no longer intended to pursue their civil action and decided to strike the case out of its list .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants asked the court to reinstate the case to its list claiming that they had not been able to appear at the hearings because the first applicant had been undergoing hospital treatment .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed its earlier decision and reinstated the case to its list . The next hearing was scheduled for DATE . DATE and DATE CARDINAL hearings were held as planned , whereas CARDINAL other hearings were postponed due to the fault of the respondent , CARDINAL for the applicants’ failure to appear , and CARDINAL others for both parties’ default .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG again considered that the applicants no longer intended to pursue their civil action and decided to strike the case out of its list .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants asked the court to reinstate the case to its list . On DATE the ORG quashed its decision of DATE after finding that the applicants had not been duly notified of certain unspecified hearings and resumed the proceedings . The next hearing was scheduled for DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP The hearing of DATE was adjourned as the respondent did not appear .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the hearings were held as planned .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicants’ claims in full .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the first applicant sued ORG of GPE for recalculation of his pension .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Justice of the Peace of ORG of LOC of GPE dismissed his claims .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of GPE upheld the judgment on appeal .
